default_effect.name: Resistance Down
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]70%[-] chance to reduce enemy resistance for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s). This skill ignores enemies' resistance.

active_effect.name: Curse
active_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]90%[-] chance to curse the enemy for [FFD428]5[-] turn(s). Cursed foes take HP damage.

super_effect.name: Fulminating Curse
super_effect.description: Deals explosive damage in proportion to the number of curses afflicted upon the opponent.

default_effect.name: Expose Weakness
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]90%[-] chance to expose the enemy's weakness for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s). [i]Expose Weakness does not stack, and exposed foes take increased damage from the next attack.[/i]

active_effect.name: Weaken
active_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]80%[-] chance to weaken the enemy for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s). Weakened foes have reduced attack and defense.

default_effect.name: Sap
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]100%[-] chance to inflict the enemy with three types of sap damage for [FFD428]5[-] turn(s). Sapped foes have decreased resistance.

active_effect.name: Recovery Seal
active_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]100%[-] chance to disable the enemy's HP recovery for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s).

super_effect.name: Full Buff Breaker
super_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]100%[-] chance to dispel all enemy enhancements including shields and immunity.

default_effect.name: Blind
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]90%[-] chance to blind the enemy for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s). Blinded foes' critical hit rate and damage are reduced.

active_effect.name: Shield
active_effect.description: Grants a high-capacity shield to all allies for [FFD428]5[-] turn(s).

super_effect.name: Damage Reduction
super_effect.description: Reduces damage received by [FFD428]50%[-] for [FFD428]5[-] turn(s).

default_effect.name: Defense Down
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]80%[-] chance to reduce the enemy's defense for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s).

active_effect.name: Crit. Rate Up
active_effect.description: Increases all allies' critical hit rate for [FFD428]2[-] turn(s).

default_effect.name: Weaken
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]80%[-] chance to weaken the enemy for [FFD428]2[-] turn(s). Weakened foes have reduced attack and defense.

active_effect.name: Attack Up
active_effect.description: Increases allies' attack power for [FFD428]5[-] turn(s).

super_effect.name: Puncture
super_effect.description: Applies a self-buff that ignores [FFD428]70%[-] of the enemy's base defense.

default_effect.name: Stun
default_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]80%[-] chance to stun the enemy for [FFD428]2[-] turn(s).

active_effect.name: Resistance Down
active_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]80%[-] chance to reduce enemy resistance for [FFD428]3[-] turn(s). This skill ignores enemies' resistance.

super_effect.name: Shock
super_effect.description: Grants a [FFD428]100%[-] chance to shock target for [FFD428]2[-] turn(s). Shocked foes cannot act and have reduced defense.
